WELCOME TO THE HFTP SOUTH FLORIDA CHAPTER

HFTP GLOBAL
CAREER CENTER
JOIN HFTP

As part of Hospitality Financial and Technology Professionals (HFTP), The South Florida Chapter is dedicated to enriching the hospitality industry in Florida and the surrounding area. Visitors and non-members are always welcome. We encourage you to get involved!

Please see the EVENTS tab to stay in touch.
